mutants.code:
def calculate_expected_conquered_points(n, m, distances):
    mod = 998244354
    fac = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        fac *= i
    inv = pow(fac, mod - 2, mod)
    ans = 0
    for j in range(m):
        na = sorted([distances[i][j] for i in range(n)])
        now = 1
        able = 0
        for i in range(n):
            while len(na) > 0 and na[-1] > n - i:
                del na[-1]
                able += 1
            now *= able
            able -= 1
        ans += now * inv
        ans %= mod
    return (m - ans) % mod

        ans %= mod
    return (m - ans) % mod

mutants.mutated_line: while len(na) > 0 and na[--1] > n - i:
mutants.code:
def calculate_expected_conquered_points(n, m, distances):
    mod = 998244353
    fac = 1
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        fac *= i
    inv = pow(fac, mod - 2, mod)
    ans = 0
    for j in range(m):
        na = sorted([distances[i][j] for i in range(n)])
        now = 1
        able = 0
        for i in range(n):
            while len(na) > 0 and na[--1] > n - i:
                del na[-1]
                able += 1
            now *= able
            able -= 1
        ans += now * inv
        ans %= mod
    return (m - ans) % mod
